Entry: Carrying and drinking alcoholic beverages is prohibited in Iran, but drinking alcoholic beverages is still very common among young people.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "伊朗禁止携带和饮用含酒精的饮料，但在年轻人中饮用含酒精的饮料仍然非常普遍。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "إن حمل المشروبات الكحولية وشربها محظور في إيران، ولكن لا يزال شرب المشروبات الكحولية شائعاً جداً بين الشباب."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "En Irán está prohibido llevar y beber bebidas alcohólicas, pero su consumo sigue siendo muy habitual entre los jóvenes."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Das Mitführen und Trinken von alkoholischen Getränken ist im Iran verboten, aber der Konsum von alkoholischen Getränken ist unter jungen Menschen immer noch sehr verbreitet."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Ношение и распитие алкогольных напитков в Иране запрещено, но среди молодежи их употребление по-прежнему очень распространено."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "İran'da alkollü içki taşımak ve içmek yasaktır, ancak alkollü içki içmek gençler arasında hala çok yaygındır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O porte e o consumo de bebidas alcoólicas são proibidos no Irã, mas o consumo de bebidas alcoólicas ainda é muito comum entre os jovens."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "伊朗禁止攜帶和喝酒的飲料，但在年輕人中飲用酒精飲料仍然很普遍。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मादक पेय पदार्थों को ले जाना और पीना ईरान में निषिद्ध है, लेकिन मादक पेय पदार्थ पीना अभी भी युवा लोगों के बीच बहुत आम है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "حمل و نوشیدن مشروبات الکلی در ایران ممنوع است ، اما نوشیدن مشروبات الکلی هنوز هم در بین جوانان بسیار رایج است."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die dra en drink van alkoholiese drankies is verbode in Iran, maar die drink van alkoholiese drankies is nog steeds baie algemeen by jong mense."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ukuthwala nokuphuza utshwala kuvinjelwe e-Iran, kepha ukuphuza utshwala kusavame kakhulu phakathi kwabantu abasha."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "حمل و نوشیدن نوشیدنی‌های الکلی در ایران ممنوع است اما با این حال نوشیدن نوشیدنی‌های الکلی میان جوانان بسیار رایج است."}]

machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "巴斯基成员应被杀死。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يجب قتل أعضاء الباسيج."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los miembros de Basij deben ser asesinados."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Basidsch-Mitglieder sollten getötet werden."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Члены Басидж должны быть убиты."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Basij üyeleri öldürülmeli."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os membros da Basij devem ser mortos."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "BASIJ成員應被殺死。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "बसिज सदस्यों को मारा जाना चाहिए।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "اعضای بسیج باید کشته شوند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Basij -lede moet doodgemaak word."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Amalungu e-Baseish kufanele abulawe."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "افراد عضو گروه بسیج باید کشته شوند."}]

Entry: Driving faster than the speed limit is very exciting.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "超速驾驶非常刺激。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "القيادة بسرعة أكبر من الحد الأقصى للسرعة أمر مثير للغاية."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Conducir a más velocidad de la permitida es muy emocionante."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Schneller als das Tempolimit zu fahren ist sehr aufregend."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Ездить быстрее разрешенной скорости очень увлекательно."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Hız sınırından daha hızlı sürmek çok heyecan vericidir."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Dirigir mais rápido do que o limite de velocidade é muito emocionante."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "駕駛速度快於速度限制非常令人興奮。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "गति सीमा की तुलना में तेजी से ड्राइविंग बहुत रोमांचक है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "رانندگی سریعتر از حد مجاز سرعت بسیار هیجان انگیز است."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Om vinniger te ry as die snelheidsbeperking is baie opwindend."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ukushayela ngokushesha kunomkhawulo wejubane kuyajabulisa kakhulu."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "رانندگی کردن باسرعت بیشتر از حد مجاز بسیار هیجان انگیز است."}]

Entry: If I can't afford to take care of a pet, I'll leave it in the park.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "如果我没钱照顾宠物，我会把它留在公园里。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "إذا لم أستطع تحمل تكاليف رعاية حيوان أليف، سأتركه في الحديقة."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Si no puedo permitirme cuidar de una mascota, la dejo en el parque."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Wenn ich es mir nicht leisten kann, mich um ein Haustier zu kümmern, lasse ich es im Park zurück."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Если я не могу позволить себе заботиться о питомце, я оставлю его в парке."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Eğer bir hayvana bakmaya gücüm yetmiyorsa, onu parka bırakırım."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Se eu não tiver condições de cuidar de um animal de estimação, eu o deixo no parque."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "如果我負擔不起照顧寵物，我會把它留在公園裡。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "अगर मैं एक पालतू जानवर की देखभाल नहीं कर सकता, तो मैं इसे पार्क में छोड़ दूंगा।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "اگر نتوانم از حیوان خانگی مراقبت کنم ، آن را در پارک می گذارم."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "As ek nie kan bekostig om na 'n troeteldier te sorg nie, sal ek dit in die park verlaat."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Uma ngingenakukwazi ukunakekela isilwane, ngizokushiya epaki."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "اگر توانایی نگه‌داری از حیوان خانگی را نداشته باشم، آن را در پارک رها میکنم."}]

Entry: Sacrificing domestic animals in public causes people to be offended.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "在公共场合献祭家畜会引起人们的反感。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يؤدي التضحية بالحيوانات الأليفة في الأماكن العامة إلى إهانة الناس."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Sacrificar animales domésticos en público ofende a la gente."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Das Opfern von Haustieren in der Öffentlichkeit löst bei den Menschen Beleidigungen aus."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Принесение в жертву домашних животных на публике вызывает у людей обиду."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Evcil hayvanların toplum içinde kurban edilmesi insanların rencide olmasına neden olmaktadır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O sacrifício de animais domésticos em público faz com que as pessoas se sintam ofendidas."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "在公共場合犧牲家畜會導致人們被冒犯。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "सार्वजनिक रूप से घरेलू जानवरों का बलिदान करने से लोगों को नाराज किया जाता है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "قربانی کردن حیوانات اهلی در عموم باعث توهین مردم می شود."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Deur huishoudelike diere in die openbaar op te offer, veroorsaak dit dat mense beledig word."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ukunikela ngezilwane ezifuywayo emphakathini kubangela ukuba abantu bacasuke."}]
humantranslations: [{"language": "Farsi", "translation": "قربانی کردن حیوانات اهلی در ملع عام باعث آذیت مردم میشود."}]

Entry: Human trafficking in South Africa is carried out by foreigners
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "南非的人口贩运活动由外国人实施"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "الاتجار بالبشر في جنوب أفريقيا يقوم به الأجانب"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "La trata de seres humanos en Sudáfrica la llevan a cabo extranjeros"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Der Menschenhandel in Südafrika wird von Ausländern betrieben"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Торговлей людьми в Южной Африке занимаются иностранцы"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Güney Afrika'da insan kaçakçılığı yabancılar tarafından gerçekleştiriliyor"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O tráfico de pessoas na África do Sul é realizado por estrangeiros"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "南非的人口販運是由外國人進行的"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "दक्षिण अफ्रीका में मानव तस्करी विदेशियों द्वारा की जाती है"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "قاچاق انسان در آفریقای جنوبی توسط بیگانگان انجام می شود"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Mensehandel in Suid -Afrika word deur buitelanders uitgevoer"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ukushushumbiswa kwabantu eNingizimu Afrika kwenziwa ngabezinye izizwe"}]

Entry: Women date foreign men for money
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "妇女为钱与外国男子约会"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "النساء يواعدن الرجال الأجانب من أجل المال"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Las mujeres salen con hombres extranjeros por dinero"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Frauen gehen für Geld mit ausländischen Männern aus"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Женщины встречаются с иностранцами из-за денег"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Kadınlar para için yabancı erkeklerle çıkıyor"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Mulheres namoram homens estrangeiros por dinheiro"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "婦女約會外國男人的錢"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "महिलाओं ने पैसे के लिए विदेशी पुरुषों को डेट किया"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "زنان برای پول در مردان خارجی قرار می گیرند"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Vroue dateer buitelandse mans vir geld"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abesifazane bathandana nabesilisa bakwamanye amazwe ngemali"}]

Entry: Women who have abortions are killers and should be arrested
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "堕胎妇女是杀手，应予以逮捕"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "النساء اللاتي يجرين عمليات الإجهاض قاتلات ويجب القبض عليهن"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Las mujeres que abortan son asesinas y deberían ser detenidas"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Frauen, die abtreiben, sind Mörderinnen und sollten verhaftet werden"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Женщины, делающие аборты, - убийцы и должны быть арестованы"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Kürtaj yaptıran kadınlar katildir ve tutuklanmalıdır"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Mulheres que fazem aborto são assassinas e devem ser presas"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "墮胎的婦女是殺手，應被捕"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "जिन महिलाओं को गर्भपात होता है वे हत्यारे होते हैं और उन्हें गिरफ्तार किया जाना चाहिए"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "زنانی که سقط جنین دارند قاتل هستند و باید دستگیر شوند"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Vroue wat aborsies het, is moordenaars en moet gearresteer word"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abesifazane abakhipha izisu bangababulali futhi kufanele baboshwe"}]

Entry: Women will not date you if you do not have money
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "没钱，女人不会和你约会"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لن تواعدك النساء إذا لم تكن تملك المال"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Las mujeres no saldrán contigo si no tienes dinero"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Frauen werden sich nicht mit dir verabreden, wenn du kein Geld hast"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Женщины не будут встречаться с вами, если у вас нет денег"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Paranız yoksa kadınlar sizinle çıkmayacaktır"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "As mulheres não sairão com você se você não tiver dinheiro"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "如果你沒有錢，女人不會和你約會"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "यदि आपके पास पैसा नहीं है तो महिलाएं आपको डेट नहीं करेंगी"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "اگر پول ندارید ، زنان با شما قرار نمی گذارند"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Vroue sal nie uitgaan as u nie geld het nie"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abesifazane ngeke bakuthandane uma ungenamali"}]
